channel.title: Pages on Quiqr
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Quiqr

item.title: Community
Download
hugoconf
item.description: Quiqr went public at the Hugo Conf 2022. We want to thanks the people of the HugoConf for giving us time and space to promote our project. The slides of Pim’s Lightning Talk are available for reading back and you can download these slides as a Quiqr Template too.

item.title: Screenshots
item.description: Quiqr looks like this… ready to use templates import Quiqr templates or Hugo Themes powerful CMS multiple sync targets, e.g. publish to GitHub Pages
